patterns_addressed.messaging_events: Converted to specific emotional dynamics, disclosure moments, or key phrases from scenes
patterns_addressed.writing_events: Converted to capture what's being processed, drafted, or the insight gained
patterns_addressed.waiting_events: Converted to name what's being anticipated or the emotional weight of suspension
patterns_addressed.remembering_events: Converted to name what's being remembered or the significance of the memory
patterns_addressed.at_location_events: Converted to evocative activities, encounters, or emotional moments at those places
patterns_addressed.truncated_names: Restored with full emotional weight and completing the thought

naming_principles.evocative_over_literal: Memoir-like names that capture emotional essence over factual description
naming_principles.unique_identifiers: Each event name is distinctive across the entire 2022 year
naming_principles.scene_informed: Names drawn from key scenes, phrases, or emotional climaxes within the event
naming_principles.no_dates: All parenthetical dates removed - names stand independently
naming_principles.narrative_significance: Names hint at why this moment matters to the larger story
naming_principles.completion: Truncated names restored to full phrases with their psychological weight
